Name: NativeBridge
Tagline: Automate mobile testing on real devices with AI
Description: Instant access to real iOS and Android devices with one Magic Link. Run AI-powered tests using Maestro, capture crashes, and share rich bug reports. Turn mobile testing into a superpower.

Name: Opttab
Tagline: Manage your presence in AI search
Description: Opttab is an all-in-one AI visibility and GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) platform designed to help brands, individuals, and businesses measure, control, and grow their presence across AI-powered search engines and LLMs such as ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Perplexity and other AI models. Unlike traditional SEO tools, Opttab focuses on how AI models discover, interpret, rank, and reuse your content‚Äîgiving you full transparency and control over your AI-facing digital footprint.

Name: Drylendar
Tagline: Track drinks to create a motivating calendar day after day!
Description: Drylendar is the most friendly alcohol tracker on the App Store. It has been designed to be very simple to use to produce an understandable calendar you can share with your friends. As much features are free to use, you can subscribe to a Premium Plan to get the best of the app (no ads, daily reminders, verified badge‚Ä¶)

Name: Bookmark Assistant
Tagline: Sync Chrome bookmarks to Notion with rich metadata.
Description: Transform your Chrome bookmarks into an organized Notion database with one click. Bookmark Assistant is a production-ready extension that automatically extracts descriptions, syncs changes, and keeps your bookmarks perfectly organized in Notion‚Äîno manual copying required.

Name: Dashly
Tagline: Turn your new tab into a dashboard.
Description: Dashly is a personalized productivity dashboard that cuts out the fluff. * Encrypted todos & notes * Market charts * RSS feeds * Pomodoro timer * Bookmark shortcuts * World clock * Daily inspirational quote * Customizable search categories with bulk search * Local export & import functionality * Theming support * No cloud, no data sharing Everything is widget-based and fully draggable, allowing users to arrange the dashboard exactly to their preference.

Name: Invoce.ai
Tagline: Chat with AI to create invoices in seconds
Description: Invoce.ai helps freelancers and small businesses avoid bloated invoice tools by letting them simply chat with AI and create invoices in seconds, without extra setup or clutter.

Name: CogniMemo Extension
Tagline: AI memory tool that lives where you work
Topics: Chrome Extensions, User Experience, Artificial Intelligence
Description: CogniMemo helps your AI remember. It adds long-term memory to ChatGPT and other AI tools. You can type @cogni in any chat to search your saved notes, past chats, and content. It works with ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and DeepSeek. You can save posts from X/Twitter, archive your AI conversations, and use a floating assistant on any website to explain or write using your own knowledge. Everything stays organized in one fast, searchable place‚Äîand your data stays under your control.

Name: Weather mini for Apple Watch
Tagline: Meet Weather mini 3, smart weather cards on your wrist.
Description: Check out Weather mini 3 for Apple Watch: - Get fresh, animated illustrations of the weather right now. - See detailed hourly and daily forecast cards. - Discover new complications like a day and night tracker. - Enjoy a built-in watch face gallery.

Name: Toma
Tagline: AI agents for automotive dealerships
Description: Toma builds Voice AI agents for automotive dealerships that answer every call, automate service scheduling, and protect revenue with dealer-specific safeguards. Improve CSI, reduce missed calls, and streamline customer communication.

Name: MiroMiro
Tagline: Copy any website's design & assets in one click
Description: The fastest way to copy any website's design. MiroMiro is a Chrome extension that lets you inspect and extract design assets from any website without opening DevTools. Hover over any element to instantly copy its CSS, colors, fonts, and spacing. Download images, SVGs, and even Lottie animations with one click. Extract design tokens and export them as Tailwind config or CSS variables. Built for designers and developers who want to stop rebuilding from scratch and start shipping faster.

Name: PostSyncer
Tagline: Create, schedule & reply with AI across 10 social platforms
Description: The most powerful tool to manage all your social accounts at scale. Create, schedule, and reply across 10+ platforms. Get inspiration from the viral content library, generate media with AI (Sora, Veo & more), connect unlimited accounts and manage clients in dedicated workspaces.

Name: Undistractable
Tagline: Stay focused, be productive
Description: Block distracting apps and stay focused on what matters. Take control of your time and achieve deep work with Undistractable.

Name: VibePeak
Tagline: Real estate videos that bring every room to life.
Description: VibePeak‚Äôs Real Estate Template turns ordinary interior photos into polished marketing videos. Upload room photos and choose between three transformations: modern renovation, full furnishing, or adding people to bring the space to life. Personalise the video with your own script, voiceover, background music and hundreds of voice options. Rendering takes minutes, giving you a ready-to-use video almost instantly.

Name: prettylog.net
Tagline: Transform messy server logs into clean, readable format
Description: PrettyLog transforms messy server logs into clean, readable format with syntax highlighting and fast filtering.

Name: Element UI
Tagline: Free component library for Elementor
Description: Build professional Elementor sites in hours, not days. Element UI gives you free access to a growing library of fully responsive, copy and paste layouts - all built with clean structure and best practices. Made for freelancers, agencies, and beginners who want to ship faster without the bloat of heavy themes or extra plugins.

Name: Camoleo
Tagline: Show the right message to every visitor on your website
Description: Camoleo lets you personalize your website without creating multiple pages or writing code. Pick which text and images can change, and Camoleo shows the right content to each visitor automatically. You can use AI to create new copy and test variations fast so every visitor sees something relevant.

Name: spectra.fm
Tagline: Design once. Ship everywhere.
Description: Spectra is a visual production system for teams that need marketing visuals at scale. Instead of redesigning assets for every format, locale, or campaign, you define a visual system once and generate consistent outputs everywhere ‚Äî App Store screenshots, ads, and campaign assets ‚Äî without manual rework or drift. Built for agencies and growth teams who treat visuals as infrastructure, not one-off designs.

Name: xfwd.link
Tagline: Smart Links: Auto-Switching, Geo-Routing & A/B Testing.

Traffic engineering for everyone.

Name: InvestBot
Tagline: Investment research that explains decisions not just outputs
Description: Most investment tools focus on predictions and picks. This one doesn‚Äôt. InvestBot is an investment research engine that builds portfolios based on explicit risk constraints - and tracks how they evolve over time. No signals. No forecasts. No execution. Every allocation decision is explained, and every change is tied to shifts in risk, fundamentals, or market structure. Built for investors who want to think clearly, not react emotionally.

Name: MockBlast
Tagline: Generate 1M+ rows of SQL/Mongo data instantly & fast.
Description: Generate millions of rows of mock data for PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, & SQLite. Stop writing INSERT scripts manually. MockBlast parses your raw CREATE TABLE schema to auto-detect types (UUID, JSONB, Boolean). Unlike basic tools, it maintains Referential Integrity (Foreign Keys) across tables and generates valid Bcrypt passwords for testing logins. Built with streaming technology to generate 1M+ rows instantly. 10,000 rows free (10x the industry standard).
